title: Beautiful Monster 2
description: The second and final book in the Beautiful Monster series has arrived!Liam knows his plan is so preposterous that it will either be wildly successful... or fatal.But it's a risk he has no choice but to take - for his sake and for Amy's.If Amy thought her first year at Leopard Academy was a whirlwind, she'd better brace herself for a typhoon.Scroll up and click the buy button now...
author: Bella Forrest
